title: FS: "The Tobacco Card Shirt" - t206 T-Shirts- with/without New Chest Logos
author: Smanzari

posts.post_title: FS: "The Tobacco Card Shirt" - t206 T-Shirts- with/without New Chest Logos
posts.post_content:
Hey Everyone-

Like just about everyone on this forum, I LOVE everything about t206 cards from the variations to the backs! I have always wanted to incorporate their designs (and other tobacco card designs) into shirts and have finally completed my first design. 

I have Short-Sleeved and Long-Sleeved Available, with pictures of my favorites below! These are a limited edition run, so only available for about a week.

Now WITH AND WITHOUT Front Chest Logo


You can get a shirt HERE: [URL="https://teespring.com/BBHeritage_Piedmont_2017#pid=369&cid=6512&sid=back"]with Front Chest Logo
[/URL]

Only available until 10p CST - 2/21/17

[URL="https://teespring.com/the-tobacco-card-shirt-2017#pid=369&cid=6518&sid=back"][IMG]http://i44.photobucket.com/albums/f48/SMVintage/back.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL="https://teespring.com/the-tobacco-card-shirt-2017#pid=11&cid=2500&sid=back"][IMG]http://i44.photobucket.com/albums/f48/SMVintage/back%201.jpg[/IMG]
[/URL]
[IMG]http://i44.photobucket.com/albums/f48/SMVintage/Front%201.png[/IMG]

Thank you for the look!

Nice!  
I was born in Bloomington.  My grandfather was once president of ISU and my other grandfather owned the Deer Creek Telephone Company. :D
Sorry for the brag post.

That is super neat! Good luck with your sales! If you make a EPDG shirt, let me know!!!

Thanks
Ed

Pretty sweet. 

To the OP, what kind of shirts will this be printed on? Please tell me a softer shirt (and not a cheap Gildan) and I'm in.

[quote name="Ed_Hutchinson" post=1629906]That is super neat! Good luck with your sales! If you make a EPDG shirt, let me know!!!

Thanks
Ed[/QUOTE]

I wonder if an EPDG shirt would carry a premium? :D

Count me in on a Polar Bear

It would be nice if you offered the player of your choice on the front with the back of your choice on the back.

However verified front back combos only would be needed for authentication.;)

Thanks for the compliments! If all goes to plan, I do hope to also offer the other backs.

As for t-shirt material- the short sleeved tees are Teespring's Proprietary Tees, they are a soft "ringspun"-esque shirt. The longsleeve are the heavier Gildan's.
Did anybody else check to see if this was a factory 42 back?

[quote name="BleedinBlue" post=1629988]Did anybody else check to see if this was a factory 42 back?[/QUOTE]

After a couple of summers they will be.:D

I like the shirts and if I get one if would be fun to wear to card shows.  My only thoughts are that I would rather not have a logo on the front, and it would be nice to have a pocket on the front to carry want lists, a pen, etc. at card shows.

Otherwise, very nice.

Thanks, Rick

^^
I was thinking the same thing . The back is awesome but the front deters me from getting one . What are the chances of changing it if you have a large consensus ? Maybe a pocket with image of card on it ? 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

[quote name="buymycards" post=1630008]I like the shirts and if I get one if would be fun to wear to card shows.  My only thoughts are that I would rather not have a logo on the front, and it would be nice to have a pocket on the front to carry want lists, a pen, etc. at card shows.

Otherwise, very nice.

Thanks, Rick[/QUOTE]

[quote name="cbrandtw" post=1630022]^^
I was thinking the same thing . The back is awesome but the front deters me from getting one . What are the chances of changing it if you have a large consensus ? Maybe a pocket with image of card on it ? 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk[/QUOTE]


Thanks for the feedback. Pockets are not an option through the company I am using. 

As for the logo, I will take that into consideration- I was avoiding using the card fronts since there are numerous different combos and I wanted to use multiple colors for the shirt. (Also, my target market isn't just collectors). Additionally, I have a stack of baseball designs (in addition to the tcards) so more or less attempting some branding

I will definitely look into other options though

[quote name="BleedinBlue" post=1629988]Did anybody else check to see if this was a factory 42 back?[/QUOTE]

Ha!  First thing I did when I saw this...:D

AndyH

Thanks for listening to the input . I wouldn't think everyone is into a pocket but it seems the consensus is to not have that logo on the front . Maybe just a small print of the back . Either way, I'll be watching for updates . Thanks for sharing 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

[quote name="cbrandtw" post=1630176]Thanks for listening to the input . I wouldn't think everyone is into a pocket but it seems the consensus is to not have that logo on the front . Maybe just a small print of the back . Either way, I'll be watching for updates . Thanks for sharing 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk[/QUOTE]

Definitely- I do want a shirt that everyone (including myself) would enjoy. I have updated the original post to include a shirt WITHOUT the front logo. 

I am devising something to put on the front for the next run (don't worry, it will be t206 relevant).

[quote name="Smanzari" post=1630241]Definitely- I do want a shirt that everyone (including myself) would enjoy. I have updated the original post to include a shirt WITHOUT the front logo. 

I am devising something to put on the front for the next run (don't worry, it will be t206 relevant).[/QUOTE]

Yeah get something on the front and I'd definitely be a buyer. The back looks awesome!!
Agreed- I would take one as well, if you make shirts big enough to fit my fat butt!

[quote name="Hellwig" post=1630295]Yeah get something on the front and I'd definitely be a buyer. The back looks awesome!![/QUOTE]

[quote name="Ed_Hutchinson" post=1630328]Agreed- I would take one as well, if you make shirts big enough to fit my fat butt![/QUOTE]

It is in the works- I figured out something that is relevant to the back for the final iteration of this shirt. However, I am unsure of the timing. As for sizing, I will look into that, too!


Thanks to everyone for the suggestions, feedback, views, and support!

An additional shirt with a Front Chest Logo has been Added. See first post for more details. Currently blank fronts only have a few days left (and will be a very limited printing!).
